text: When things go wrong, don't go with them.
author: Elvis Presley

text: People think you're crazy if you talk about things they don't understand.
author: Elvis Presley

text: To judge a man by his weakest link or deed is like judging the power of the ocean by one wave.

text: It's human nature to gripe, but I'm going ahead and doing the best I can.

text: If you let your head get too big, it'll break your neck.
author: Elvis Presley

text: The army teaches boys to think like men.
author: Elvis Presley

text: Rock and roll music, if you like it, if you feel it, you can't help but move to it. That's what happens to me. I can't help it.
author: Elvis Presley

text: It's not just self defense, it's about self control, body discipline, and mind discipline and breath techniques. It involves yoga. It involves meditation.

text: It's not just self defence, it's about self control, body discipline, and mind discipline and breath techniques. It involves yoga. It involves meditation. It's an art, not a sport.
author: Elvis Presley

text: The walls have ears, ears that hear each little sound you make every time you stamp, throw a lamp.
author: Elvis Presley

text: Rhythm is something you either have or don't have, but when you have it, you have it all over.

text: Before you abuse, criticize, and accuse walk a mile in my shoes.
author: Elvis Presley

text: Happiness is knowin' you've done a good job, whether it's professional or for another person.

text: After a hard day of basic training, you could eat a rattlesnake.
author: Elvis Presley

text: I've got fifty-six gold singles, and fourteen gold albums and if anyone out there doubts it, if you ever come through Memphis you can come argue about it, 'cause I've got every one of them hanging on the wall.
author: Elvis Presley

text: And all my cares are laid by . I'll lay down my soul, my battles are won .

text: I was training to be an electrician. I supposed I got wired the wrong way round.

text: If you know you can't take it, then baby, why try to give it? Cause I ain't for no one-sided love affair.
author: Elvis Presley

text: Take my hand, take my whole life too. For I can’t help falling in love with you.

text: I'm not trying to be sexy. It's just my way of expressing myself when I move around.
author: Elvis Presley

text: You ain't nothing but hound dog, crying all the time. You ain't never caught a rabbit and you ain't no friend of mine.
